UTI Aggressive Hybrid Fund-Reg(G).exit_load_remarks: Nil for 10% of units and 1% for remaining units on or before 12M Nil after 12M

UTI Value Fund-Reg(G).exit_load_remarks: Nil upto 10% of units and 1% for remaining units on or before 1Y Nil after 1Y
